nodes.description: Daallo航空客机从摩加迪沙机场起飞后15分钟在11000英尺高度发生爆炸
nodes.support_text: The explosion happened about 15 minutes after the plane, with 75 passengers on board, took off from the airport and was at 11,000 feet (3,500 meters) ascending toward 31,000 feet.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致机舱严重损毁，飞机紧急迫降回机场
nodes.support_text: We immediately demanded an emergency return to the airport because that was the only solution.

nodes.description: 至少20人因涉事被捕，包括机场安检疏漏中的两名男子
nodes.support_text: At least 20 people, including the two men in the CCTV footage who handed over the laptop to the suspected bomber, were arrested in connection with the explosion in the aircraft.

nodes.description: 确认笔记本电脑状装置为爆炸物，系自杀炸弹客携带
nodes.support_text: It is believed the laptop-like device was the bomb that caused the explosion.
According to Somali officials who did not give further details, Abdullahi Abdisalam Borle was killed.

nodes.description: 疑犯遗体在机场附近发现，初步确认为自杀式袭击者
nodes.support_text: A man's body was found in the town of Balad, 30 kilometers (about 18 miles) north of Mogadishu, according to police who said he might have been blown from the plane.

nodes.description: Daallo航空宣布暂停摩加迪沙机场运营
nodes.support_text: Daallo Airlines, which is based in Dubai, has temporarily suspended its operations in Somalia's capital following the incident.

nodes.description: 飞行员披露机场安检存在严重漏洞：无关人员可自由进出机坪
nodes.support_text: When we park (the plane) there, some 20 to 30 people come to the tarmac... No one has a badge or those yellow vests. They enter and leave the plane, and no one knows who is who.

nodes.description: 政府宣布将加强机场安保措施应对恐怖威胁
nodes.support_text: Somalia's government has said it will tighten security at the airport to prevent other threats.

nodes.description: 机长Vlatko Vodopivec向AP进行安全状态汇报
nodes.support_text: 机长Vlatko Vodopivec向AP进行安全状态汇报

nodes.description: 当乘客离机时，相关方可向机内投放任何物品
nodes.support_text: 当乘客离机时，相关方可向机内投放任何物品

nodes.description: 飞行员提及飞机遭枪击事件
nodes.support_text: Pilot Vodopivec mentioned the plane was struck by gunfire
The plane was struck by gunfire

edges.support_text: We immediately demanded an emergency return to the airport because that was the only solution.
It is believed the laptop-like device was the bomb that caused the explosion.
According to Somali officials who did not give further details, Abdullahi Abdisalam Borle was killed.
爆炸发生后，机长向AP进行安全状态汇报
At least 20 people, including the two men in the CCTV footage who handed over the laptop to the suspected bomber, were arrested in connection with the explosion in the aircraft.
Daallo Airlines, which is based in Dubai, has temporarily suspended its operations in Somalia's capital following the incident.
When we park (the plane) there, some 20 to 30 people come to the tarmac... No one has a badge or those yellow vests. They enter and leave the plane, and no one knows who is who.
Somalia's government has said it will tighten security at the airport to prevent other threats.
A man's body was found in the town of Balad, 30 kilometers (about 18 miles) north of Mogadishu, according to police who said he might have been blown from the plane.
安全状态汇报后，相关方开始向机内投放物品
投放物品操作影响机坪安检漏洞
枪击事件（strike）在飞行员提及（mention）之前发生
